price: 62. Balobi: Yo nde osali boye na banzambe na biso oh Ibrâhîm?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
